pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adapted Boxplot to Missing Observations // Boxplots adapted to the happenstance of missing observations where drop-out probabilities can be given by the practitioner or modelled using auxiliary covariates. The paper of "Zhang, Z., Chen, Z., Troendle, J. F. and Zhang, J.(2012) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2011.01712.x", proposes estimators of marginal quantiles based on the Inverse Probability Weighting method.
